advancement.description: The namespace and ID of the advancement the player needs to have completed in order for this condition to evaluate to true.
advancement.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the advancement the player needs to have completed in order for this condition to evaluate to true.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/advancement)

Checks whether the entity has completed a specified advancement.

Type ID: `origins:advancement`

!!! note

    **This entity condition type will only work on players.**
